kpi.name: M1006C206

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN REJECT DUE TO BUFFER LIMIT CTRL
kpi_info.use: "The number of RRC connection rejections due to buffer limit control. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC CONNECTION REJECT message to the UE because the number of unhandled messages in a signalling unit has exceeded a specified threshold value. Also M1006C21 and M1001C618 are updated along with this counter."

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN REJECT DUE TO BUFFER LIMIT CTRL
